Rescources

All resources fall from chests of different grades collected from monsters around the game world, namely: - Resource Box - Low Grade - Resource Box - Mid Grade - Resource Box - Top Grade - Resource Box - Gold (all resources drops in large numbers with an average chance)

Types of resources:
Steel - Low Grade and Mid Grade with a greater chance.
Mold Hardener - Mid Grade with an average chance.
Mold Lubricant - Mid Grade with an average chance.
Mold Glue - Low Grade and Mid Grade with an average chance.
Varnish of Purity - Top Grade with a small chance.
Mithril Alloy - Top Grade with a small chance.
